venue.name: Bond Bar at The Langham Hotel

item.description:
Join us for an elegant afternoon tea inside Bond Lounge in the Langham Hotel, Boston. Afternoon tea includes a delicious selection of scones, sandwiches, dessert and of course- tea! Price is $30 per person + tax/tip. This will be a relaxing and fun event!

RSVP Note. Please only sign up if you can definitely attend as this will be a popular event and space is limited. Please do not sign up just to hold your spot without knowing if you can definitely attend. If your plans change, please be sure to update your RSVP.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) at our table- reservation is under my name. If you have trouble finding us, call 774 232 0000
item.name: Afternoon Tea at the Langham Hotel, Boston
